title: Bbq chicken and pasta bake
ingredients: ['450g penne pasta', '2 eggs', '125ml milk', 'salt and pepper to taste', '6 (115g) skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets', '110g breadcrumbs', '125ml olive oil for frying', '30g butter', '450g rashers streaky bacon', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1 onion, diced', '515g bottled honey mustard BBQ sauce', '3 tablespoons spicy mustard', '225g grated Cheddar cheese']
